titleStmt.title: The foundation of the faythfull In a sermon deliuered at Paules Crosse the 17. of Ianuarie. 1610. By Samuel Gardiner, Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Samuel, b. 1563 or 4.

notesStmt.note: Copy catalogued does not contain extra leaf signed A1, with dedication to Archbishop G. Abbot in preface.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
